thread.title: David Chang Unveils Newest Momofuku Outpost in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: David Chang Unveils Newest Momofuku Outpost in Las Vegas

author: Brenna Houck
title: David Chang Unveils Newest Momofuku Outpost in Las Vegas

locations.name: las vegas david chang unveils newest momofuku outpost

text: David Chang Unveils Newest Momofuku Outpost in Las Vegas Brace for pork buns and rotisserie duck Momofuku At long last, the newest outpost of David Chang’s Momofuku empire has made its debut at the Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas. As Eater Vegas reports , the restaurant opened its doors Tuesday night on the second level of the hotel and casino, right next to fellow Momofuku Group concept Christina Tosi’s Milk Bar, which debuted in late December . Chef Michael Chen, a veteran of the Vegas dining scene, is leading the kitchen at the 200-seat restaurant. The interior features plenty of Las Vegas glitz, with custom neons hung over the bar and a dining room mural featuring Chang’s Instagram-famous dog , Seve. A private dining room overlooks the Strip and has custom carpet printed with the restaurant group’s signature peach. A photo posted by Danny Lee (@dnjlee) on Jan 10, 2017 at 9:09pm PST The menu includes an assortment of dishes found at Chang’s other Momofuku concepts, including ramen and pork buns from Momofuku Noodle Bar, Fuku chicken sandwiches, rotisserie duck from Momofuku Ssam Bar, and desserts from the neighboring Milk Bar. A soup section on the menu includes kimchi stew and oxtail soup, sure to be well-received by the city’s hungover masses. And, since this is Vegas we’re talking about, there’s also fried chicken with caviar — Chang’s version of surf and turf. A photo posted by Vern Floranda (@urfnsomm) on Jan 10, 2017 at 8:42pm PST A photo posted by marguerite mariscal (@mzmariscal) on Jan 10, 2017 at 8:41pm PST A video posted by Matthew Rudofker (@c_mdi) on Jan 10, 2017 at 6:51pm PST The Cosmopolitan is also home to restaurant concepts from celebrity chef and Donald Trump nemesis José Andrés , along with Chopped judges Scott Conant (Scarpetta and D.O.C.G.) and Chris Santos (Beauty & Essex) as well as recently arrived LA export Eggslut . The restaurant is presently open for dinner only with lunch expected to launch in the near future, according to David Chang’s Instagram . Momofuku begins taking reservations today. This is the latest in a tremendous expansion of the Momofuku empire, which includes restaurants in New York, Washington D.C., Sydney, and Toronto. A new Momofuku concept is slated for Manhattan’s Pier 17 sometime in 2017.
